message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  I'd be happy to pay $110 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $135.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm sticking with my offer of $110.  Let me know if you're willing to accept it.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $125.
